name: NIKOLA PRLJETA
summary:
Experienced software engineer and business analyst adept in all stages
of advanced app development. Knowledgeable in user interface, testing,
and debugging processes.

Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects, as well as
collaborate in a team setting.

Bringing forth expertise in design, installation, testing and maintenance
of iPhone and cross platform applications.

Equipped with a diverse and ever-expanding skill set.

sections.title: KEYWORDS
sections.text: EHR, LMS, CRM, ERP, Fintech, SaaS, Cloud, AI, LLM, Combine, CoreData, MapsKit, Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, Xcode, iOS, App Store, Push Notifications, ARKit, Firebase, Alamofire, URLSession, CoreAnimation, CoreML, HealthKit, StoreKit, React Native, Flutter, Expo, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, Redux, GraphQL, REST API, JSON, HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Electron, Progressive Web Apps, PWA, Webpack, Babel, Vite, ESLint, Jest, Cypress, Git, GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, GCP, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, Redis, Realm DB, Socket.IO, Agile, Scrum, Kanban, Unit Testing, Integration Testing, UI Testing, Crashlytics, App Center, Analytics, Mixpanel, Amplitude, OAuth, JWT, Security, Encryption, Accessibility, Localization, Internationalization, Microservices, Serverless, RESTful Services, WebSockets, Background Tasks, Caching, MVVM, MVC, VIPER, Coordinator Pattern, Dependency Injection, Reactive Programming, RxSwift, Combine Framework, Async/Await, Concurrency, Threading, Performance Optimization, Memory Management, In-App Purchases, App Monetization, PushKit, SiriKit, WordPress, Shopify, Squarespace, Wix

sections.title: HOBBIES
sections.text: Art, culture, music, movies, photography, books, technology, fashion, working out, cycling

items.title: Instructor
items.description: Delivering hands-on training in JavaScript Front-End; mentoring students and guiding project-based learning.

items.title: Country Manager
items.description: Overseeing Serbian operations; driving strategy execution, team coordination, and market growth initiatives.

items.title: Mobile Developer (iOS & Android)
items.description: Led full lifecycle development of Skillogs’ LMS apps across iOS, Android, and web; held full product ownership.

items.title: Software Engineer, External Consultant
items.description: Supported early-stage blockchain startup through technical contributions, hiring, and candidate interviews.

items.title: iOS Developer
items.description: Focused on front-end performance optimization, UI implementation, and modern iOS best practices.

items.title: iOS Developer, UI/UX
items.description: Owned design and development of Serbia’s national healthcare EHR iOS application from end to end.

items.title: IT Consultant
items.description: Created technical documentation, performed English–Serbian translation, and supported BA/QA for Telekom Srbija’s CRM system.

items.title: Freelance Collaborator
items.description: Contributed to Cathode TV project through research, design, and creative collaboration.

items.title: Freelance Collaborator
items.description: Collaborated on NoQue project, supporting content development and technical input.

items.title: Freelance Collaborator
items.description: Contributed to Salt project in a freelance technical and creative capacity.

items.title: Moderator, Administrator
items.description: Moderated and managed health-related community content, ensuring compliance and user engagement.

items.title: Software Engineer Intern
items.description: Internship focused on R&D, design, and implementation support for the Emotivio project.

items.title: Community Manager
items.description: Managed community engagement and events for Belgrade’s Furniture Fair.

items.title: FIT, Univerzitet Metropolitan
items.description: Specialized in software engineering, information systems, game development, and IT security; curriculum follows ACM/IEEE guidelines with a strong emphasis on practical skills, innovation, and entrepreneurship.

items.title: High school
items.description: Prestigious upper‐secondary school known for its strong academic programmes (Natural, Social, Economics, Humanities), with Swedish, International & Music sections; emphasizes diversity, tolerance and preparing students for global challenges.

items.title: Grade school
items.description: Comprehensive F–9 school known for strong academics, inclusive learning environment, and emphasis on personal development through specialized profiles in mathematics, sports, and the arts.
